original_text: You cannot find food for the ravens to eat. You cannot help them when their babies cry to me because they are weak and hungry.’ You cannot find food for the ravens to eat. You cannot help them when their babies cry to me because they are weak and hungry.’ You cannot find food for the ravens to eat.
korean_text: 까마귀 새끼가 하나님을 향하여 부르짖으며 먹을 것이 없어서 허우적거릴 때에 그것을 위하여 먹이를 마련하는 이가 누구냐

sentences.original_text: You cannot find food for the ravens to eat
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 까마귀가 먹을 음식을 찾을 수 없다
